map.name: Get Census Geography
map.description: Retrieve Census geographic identifiers (Block Group, Tract, County, State) for a property based on coordinates. Use this when you need to identify a property

map.name: Get Census Boundary Polygon
map.description: Retrieve the GeoJSON polygon boundary for a Census geography to display on a map. Requires a GEOID from get_census_geography. Use this when the user asks to

map.name: Classify Comp Geography
map.description: Determine the geographic relationship between a subject property and a comparable property. Returns a tier (excellent/good/acceptable/marginal) and explanation. Use this when the user asks

map.name: Batch Geocode Comps
map.description: Geocode multiple comparable properties to their Census geographies in a single operation. Use this when analyzing multiple comps, after receiving comps from RentCast valuation API, or when the user asks to

map.name: Get Census Boundary by Point
map.description: Retrieve Census boundary polygon(s) that contain a specific point. This is a convenience tool that combines geocoding and boundary retrieval in one step. Use when you have coordinates and want to immediately visualize the surrounding Census geography.

map.name: Draw Search Area
map.description: Create a search area on the map by defining a center point and radius, or drawing a polygon. Returns the bounds and property count within the area.

map.name: Compare Areas
map.description: Compare multiple geographic areas based on real estate metrics like average price, days on market, inventory levels, and appreciation rates.

map.name: Show Commute Time
map.description: Display isochrone (travel time) polygons on the map showing areas reachable within a specified time using Mapbox Isochrone API.

map.name: Toggle Map Style
map.description: Switch between different map visual styles: streets, satellite, satellite-streets, light, or dark mode.

map.name: Spatial Query
map.description: Query points of interest (POIs) near a location using Mapbox Tilequery API. Find schools, restaurants, shops, and other amenities.

map.name: Compare Neighborhoods
map.description: Compare multiple neighborhoods based on livability factors like schools, walkability, transit access, and amenities using POI density analysis.

communication.description: Generate a multi-email drip sequence for seller outreach.

market_analysis.name: Seasonality Analysis
market_analysis.description: Analyze seasonal patterns in the market

market_analysis.name: Supply/Demand Analysis

market_analysis.name: Economic Indicators
market_analysis.description: Analyze economic factors affecting the market

market_analysis.name: Investment ROI Calculator
market_analysis.description: Calculate investment returns

market_analysis.name: Neighborhood Scoring
market_analysis.description: Score neighborhood quality factors

market_analysis.name: Rental Market Analysis
market_analysis.description: Analyze rental market conditions

market_analysis.name: Market Timing Indicator
market_analysis.description: Get market timing signals

market_analysis.name: Get Market Velocity
market_analysis.description:
Get the Market Velocity Index for a specific location. The velocity index
    measures buyer demand intensity on a 0-100 scale. Higher scores mean properties sell
    faster and wholesalers can assign contracts more confidently. Use this when users ask
    about market heat, buyer demand, how fast things are selling, or whether an area is
    good for wholesaling.

market_analysis.name: Find Hot Markets
market_analysis.description:
Find markets with high buyer velocity/demand. Use when users say things
    like

market_analysis.name: Find Cold Markets
market_analysis.description:
Find markets with low buyer velocity - useful for identifying areas to
    avoid or for finding deep value plays (though risky for wholesaling). Use when users
    ask about slow markets, cold areas, or places to avoid.

market_analysis.name: Compare Market Velocity
market_analysis.description:
Compare market velocity between multiple locations. Use when users want
    to compare markets, decide between areas, or understand relative demand. Examples:

market_analysis.name: Explain Velocity Score
market_analysis.description:
Explain why a specific area has its velocity score. Breaks down the
    component factors (DOM, absorption, inventory, permit activity). Use when users ask

market_analysis.name: Get Velocity Trend
market_analysis.description:
Get the historical trend of market velocity for an area. Shows whether
    the market is heating up, cooling down, or stable. Use when users ask

market_analysis.name: Get Velocity Rankings
market_analysis.description: Get ranked list of markets by velocity. Use when users want to see

market_analysis.name: Get Velocity for Map Bounds
market_analysis.description:
Get velocity data for a geographic bounding box. Used internally for
    heat map rendering.

integrations.name: Export to CRM
integrations.description: Export leads, contacts, or deals to external CRM systems.

integrations.name: Calendar Integration
integrations.description: Create, update, or manage calendar events for property viewings and meetings.

intelligence.name: Analyze Competitor Activity
intelligence.description: Analyze investor/flipper activity in zip codes using permit data.

intelligence.name: Analyze Market Saturation
intelligence.description: Analyze market saturation using real market data and permit activity.

intelligence.name: Analyze Market Velocity
intelligence.description: Comprehensive market velocity analysis for investment timing decisions.

permits.name: getPermitHistory
permits.description: Get complete permit history for a property address. Use when user asks about permits, renovations, or construction history.

permits.name: getPermitDetails
permits.description: Get detailed information about a specific permit by ID.

permits.name: searchPermitsByArea
permits.description: Search for permits in a geographic area with filters. Use for finding renovation activity in neighborhoods.

permits.name: getPermitMetrics
permits.description: Get aggregated permit metrics for a property. Shows total permits, values, and activity patterns.

permits.name: analyzePermitPatterns
permits.description: Analyze permit history to identify seller motivation signals and property condition.

permits.name: checkSystemAge
permits.description: Check the age of major systems (roof, HVAC, plumbing, electrical) based on permit history.

permits.name: identifyDeferredMaintenance
permits.description: Find properties with no recent permits, indicating potential deferred maintenance.

permits.name: findStalledPermits
permits.description: Find properties with stalled or expired permits - indicates abandoned projects or motivated sellers.

portfolio.name: Portfolio Performance Summary
portfolio.description: Get a comprehensive summary of portfolio performance from actual deal data.

portfolio.name: ROI by Strategy
portfolio.description: Analyze ROI performance by investment strategy from actual deal data.

portfolio.name: Geographic Concentration Analysis
portfolio.description: Analyze portfolio geographic concentration and diversification from actual data.

predictive.name: Predict Seller Motivation
predictive.description: Analyze property and owner data using stratified scoring models. Uses different scoring logic based on owner type: Individual (long ownership = HIGH motivation), Investor/Entity (long ownership = LOW motivation), Institutional (process-focused). Optionally includes AI-enhanced DealFlow IQ score.

predictive.name: Predict Deal Close Probability
predictive.description: Predict the likelihood of a deal closing using market velocity and property data.

predictive.name: Calculate Optimal Offer Price
predictive.description: Calculate optimal offer price using real ARV from RentCast and market data.

predictive.name: Predict Time to Close
predictive.description: Predict deal timeline using market velocity data and deal type analysis.

predictive.name: Classify Owner Type
predictive.description: Classify a property owner into categories: Individual (owner-occupied/absentee), Investor/Entity (LLC, corporation, trust), or Institutional (bank REO, government, estate). Uses pattern matching on owner name and optional signals.

predictive.name: Batch Score Seller Motivation
predictive.description: Calculate seller motivation scores for multiple properties at once. Returns scores, owner classifications, and recommendations for up to 20 properties. Useful for prioritizing lead lists.

predictive.name: Compare Motivation Scores
predictive.description: Compare seller motivation scores across multiple properties to prioritize outreach. Ranks properties and provides analysis of which to contact first.

data_enrichment.name: skipTraceLead
data_enrichment.description: Skip trace a lead to find phone numbers, emails, and addresses

data_enrichment.name: batchSkipTrace
data_enrichment.description: Queue multiple leads for skip tracing

data_enrichment.name: getSkipTraceStatus
data_enrichment.description: Check the status of a skip trace request

data_enrichment.name: validatePhoneNumber
data_enrichment.description: Validate and get info about a phone number

data_enrichment.name: enrichLeadData
data_enrichment.description: Enrich lead with demographics, property, or financial data

data_enrichment.name: findRelatedContacts
data_enrichment.description: Find relatives, associates, or neighbors of a lead

data_enrichment.name: reversePhoneLookup
data_enrichment.description: Look up owner information by phone number

data_enrichment.name: reverseAddressLookup
data_enrichment.description: Look up owner information by property address

utility.name: Geocode Address
utility.description: Convert a street address or place name to geographic coordinates (latitude/longitude) using Mapbox Geocoding API.

utility.name: Reverse Geocode
utility.description: Convert geographic coordinates (latitude/longitude) to a human-readable address using Mapbox Geocoding API.

utility.name: Format Currency
utility.description: Format a numeric amount as a currency string with proper locale-specific formatting, symbols, and notation.

utility.name: Calculate Distance
utility.description: Calculate the straight-line (Haversine) distance between two points. Accepts coordinates or addresses.

verticals.description: Get vertical-specific insights and opportunities for a property.

tools.name: Get Market Velocity
tools.description:
Get the Market Velocity Index for a specific location. The velocity index
    measures buyer demand intensity on a 0-100 scale. Higher scores mean properties sell
    faster and wholesalers can assign contracts more confidently. Use this when users ask
    about market heat, buyer demand, how fast things are selling, or whether an area is
    good for wholesaling.

tools.name: Find Hot Markets
tools.description:
Find markets with high buyer velocity/demand. Use when users say things
    like

tools.name: Find Cold Markets
tools.description:
Find markets with low buyer velocity - useful for identifying areas to
    avoid or for finding deep value plays (though risky for wholesaling). Use when users
    ask about slow markets, cold areas, or places to avoid.

tools.name: Compare Market Velocity
tools.description:
Compare market velocity between multiple locations. Use when users want
    to compare markets, decide between areas, or understand relative demand. Examples:

tools.name: Explain Velocity Score
tools.description:
Explain why a specific area has its velocity score. Breaks down the
    component factors (DOM, absorption, inventory, permit activity). Use when users ask

tools.name: Get Velocity Trend
tools.description:
Get the historical trend of market velocity for an area. Shows whether
    the market is heating up, cooling down, or stable. Use when users ask

tools.name: Get Velocity Rankings
tools.description: Get ranked list of markets by velocity. Use when users want to see

tools.name: Get Velocity for Map Bounds
tools.description:
Get velocity data for a geographic bounding box. Used internally for
    heat map rendering.

tools.description: Get a comprehensive summary of portfolio performance from actual deal data.

tools.description: Analyze ROI performance by investment strategy from actual deal data.

tools.name: Geographic Concentration Analysis
tools.description: Analyze portfolio geographic concentration and diversification from actual data.

tools.name: Predict Seller Motivation
tools.description: Analyze property and owner data using stratified scoring models. Uses different scoring logic based on owner type: Individual (long ownership = HIGH motivation), Investor/Entity (long ownership = LOW motivation), Institutional (process-focused). Optionally includes AI-enhanced DealFlow IQ score.

tools.name: Predict Deal Close Probability
tools.description: Predict the likelihood of a deal closing using market velocity and property data.

tools.name: Calculate Optimal Offer Price
tools.description: Calculate optimal offer price using real ARV from RentCast and market data.

tools.name: Predict Time to Close
tools.description: Predict deal timeline using market velocity data and deal type analysis.

tools.name: Classify Owner Type
tools.description: Classify a property owner into categories: Individual (owner-occupied/absentee), Investor/Entity (LLC, corporation, trust), or Institutional (bank REO, government, estate). Uses pattern matching on owner name and optional signals.

tools.name: Batch Score Seller Motivation
tools.description: Calculate seller motivation scores for multiple properties at once. Returns scores, owner classifications, and recommendations for up to 20 properties. Useful for prioritizing lead lists.

tools.name: Compare Motivation Scores
tools.description: Compare seller motivation scores across multiple properties to prioritize outreach. Ranks properties and provides analysis of which to contact first.
